nodes.title: Web-based GUI Docker runtime

product.summary: A web-based project management and issue tracking tool
A simple but powerful control panel
A web-based interface for system administration for Unix

overview.overview: A powerful open-source management toolset that allows you to easily build, manage and maintain Docker environments.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: Portainer is a powerful, open-source management toolset that allows you to easily build, manage and maintain Docker environments.
